text: The 2015–16 season was the 114th season of competitive football in Italy. ==Promotions and relegations (pre-season)== Teams promoted to Serie A * Carpi * Frosinone * Bologna Teams relegated from Serie A * Cagliari * Cesena * Parma Teams promoted to Serie B * Novara * Teramo * Salernitana * Como Teams relegated from Serie B * Catania * Cittadella * Brescia * Varese == National teams == ===
